Name: statement
Description: The verbatim query string submitted to declare this\n cursor

Name: is_holdable
Description: true if the cursor is\n holdable (that is, it can be accessed after the transaction that declared the cursor has committed); false otherwise

Name: is_binary
Description: true if the cursor was\n declared BINARY; false otherwise

Name: is_scrollable
Description: true if the cursor is\n scrollable (that is, it allows rows to be retrieved in a nonsequential manner); false otherwise

Name: creation_time
Description: The time at which the cursor was declared
